title: Add BuildCommandEnvVars to AgentType interface
description:
Add BuildCommandEnvVars(h2Dir, roleName string) map[string]string to AgentType. Each type returns its agent-specific env vars:
- ClaudeCodeType: {"CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR": "<h2Dir>/claude-config/<roleName>"}
- CodexType: {} (empty)
- GenericType: {} (empty)

Update session.go RunDaemon and daemon.go to call agentType.BuildCommandEnvVars() and merge into ExtraEnv instead of hardcoding CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR. Remove ClaudeConfigDir from Session struct and ForkDaemonOpts â€” the agent type owns it now.
